column1: Nala was in her room ready to sleep. Nala wants to have a good night's sleep without any nightmares. The door to Nala's room is locked. Her little brother manages to find the spare key and unlocks the door to her room. Nala decides to tell her brother to leave and lock the door again.

Hugo was in the park with his friends. Hugo wanted to win the kite flying contest. The string of Hugo's kite was strong. A raven flew by and pecked at the string, making it weak. Hugo decides to change the string of his kite.

Ravi was at the fish market. Ravi wanted to buy a fish for his mom to cook for dinner. The fish on the scale was heavy. The fishmonger removed the fish guts, making the fish on the scale lighter. Ravi decides to buy the lighter fish because it's easier to carry.

Vito was at a birthday party. Vito wanted to give his friend a special gift. The gift was wrapped in a shiny paper. A distant cousin, who was also at the party, decided to play a prank and unwrapped the gift when no one was looking. Vito decides to find another gift wrap to cover the gift again.

Tim was in the kitchen, ready to make lunch. Tim wanted to make a big bowl of pasta. The pasta box was full. While Tim was busy cutting vegetables, his little sister came into the kitchen and took some pasta to play with. Tim decides to ask his sister to return the pasta.

Wendy was in the park, sitting on a bench. Wendy wanted to play a charming tune on her small flute. The flute was in her bag. A kind lady saw the flute, thought it had been left behind, and moved it to the lost and found box. Wendy decides to go to the lost and found box to get her flute.

Gigi was at the park with her friends. Gigi wanted to share her mints with her friends. The mint box was full of fat, healthy mints. A naughty squirrel sneaked up and nibbled on the mints making them sickly. Gigi decides to behave kindly and not scare the squirrel away, but she won't share the mints anymore.

Remy was in the park playing with his colorful parrot. Remy wanted his parrot to learn a new trick. The parrot was sitting on a clear and open branch. Over time, leaves spread and grew on the branch, obscuring it. Remy decides to move his parrot to a different branch.
column2: the branch the parrot is sitting on

column1: Pete was at the park, ready to eat his lunch. Pete wanted to enjoy his food while watching the birds. The food in Pete's lunch box was fresh and yummy. A naughty squirrel came and took a big bite out of Pete's sandwich. Pete decides to squeeze the rest of his sandwich into a ball and throw it to the squirrel.

Quin was in the park with his gray paint and brush. Quin wanted to paint a big tree on a big balloon. The balloon was empty. A girl nearby had a pump and she filled the balloon with air. Quin decides to wait for the balloon to be stable before he starts to paint.

Yara was at a party with her friends. Yara wanted to sing her favorite song for everyone. The microphone was working fine. During the party, a guest accidentally spilled juice on the microphone, causing it to stop working. Yara decides to wipe the juice off the microphone and try to fix it.

Sam was at the space station, waiting to travel back to Earth. Sam wants to return home to see his family. The spaceship's launch schedule was synchronized with Earth's rotation. Due to a different calculation made by the space station's computer, the spaceship's launch schedule became asynchronous with Earth's rotation. Sam decides to adjust his plan and wait for the next synchronized launch window.

Ina was at the park, sitting on a gray bench. Ina wanted to solve the puzzle in her story book. The puzzle in the story book was hard. A kind old man, who was a puzzle master, saw the puzzle and solved it while Ina was away playing. Ina decides to thank the old man and ask him to teach her how he solved the puzzle.

Lenny was at the market to buy a smelly cheese. Lenny wanted to find the best smelly cheese for his mom. The cheese was very expensive. A man at the market dropped the cheese and it got a big rub mark on it. Lenny decides to ask for a discount because the cheese is damaged.

Kip was at the mall looking at a beautiful painting. Kip wanted to buy the painting to put it in his room. The painting was very expensive. A big sale started and the price of the painting dropped a lot. Kip rushes to buy the painting before anyone else does.

Jake was in the kitchen ready to make dinner. Jake wanted to make a big salad with all the fresh groceries he bought. The knife he uses to cut veggies was very sharp. Over time, the knife became dull from cutting so many veggies. Jake decides to sharpen the knife before continuing to cut the veggies.

Yara was in the kitchen making a sandwich. Yara wanted to find the peanut butter in the cupboard to spread on her bread. The cupboard door was flat and straight. Over time, the heat from the stove caused the cupboard door to warp. Yara decides to call a carpenter to fix the warped cupboard door.

Dora was at the library looking for a fun book to read. Dora wants to find a book that will make her laugh. The book Dora wants is on the top shelf. A librarian uses a ladder to reach for a different book, causing the book Dora wants to fall from the shelf. Dora feels embarrassed but picks up the book from the floor.

Xander was in the forest, looking for deer. Xander wanted to find a deer to take a picture. The deer was hidden in the bushes. A group of birds flew off from a tree and scared the deer out of the bushes. Xander decides to quickly take a picture of the running deer.

Remy was at the park playing with his toy car. Remy wants to stay at the park until the sun goes down. The toy car was fully charged. A squirrel runs over, grabs the toy car, and accidentally turns it on, draining the battery. Remy decides to take the toy car back home and charge it.

Ed was at the airport waiting for his flight. Ed wanted to finish his book before his flight. The bottle of water Ed had was full. A flight attendant passing by accidentally knocked the bottle, spilling all the water. Ed decides to try and find a place to refill his bottle.

Caden was at the park playing with his friends. Caden wanted to show his friends his new toy lizard. The toy lizard was clean and shiny. Over time, the toy lizard got dirty from all the playing. Caden decides to clean his toy lizard.

Tilly was in the park, sitting on a bench. Tilly wanted to feed the humble rat that visited her every day. The rat was in its hole, not coming out. A cat slowly came near the rat's hole and scared the rat away. Tilly decides to shoo the cat away to make the rat feel safe.

Fergus was at the park playing fetch with his dog. Fergus wants to get his dog to fetch a long stick. The stick was lying on the ground. Over time, the sun dries out the stick making it lighter. Fergus decides to get a new stick for his dog.

Gabe was at the park with his lovely new cart. Gabe wanted to decorate his cart with shiny stickers. The cart was clean and ready for decoration. A group of playful dogs ran through the park, kicking up dust and dirt all over Gabe's cart. Gabe decides to clean his cart before decorating it.

Darius was in his art class, drawing his favorite tree. Darius wanted to make his tree look real with brown ink. The ink bottle on Darius's table was full. Over time, the sun's heat made the ink inside the bottle dry up and become hard. Darius decides to ask his teacher for more ink.

Kiki was at the beach with her metal detector. Kiki wanted to collect any gold she could find. The sand was cool and undisturbed. A group of children came to play and they kicked up the sand, disturbing its state. Kiki decides to move to a quieter part of the beach.

Xander was in the kitchen making breakfast. Xander wanted to make a good omelette for his mom. The egg in the pan was not cooked yet. The gas on the stove slowly ran out, leaving the egg partially cooked. Xander decides to work on fixing the stove to finish cooking the egg.

Yara was at a factory on a tour with her school friends. Yara wants to learn about how ice cream is made. The ice cream mix in the big vat was thick and creamy. As the tour continued, the factory staff added a special ingredient to the mix which caused it to freeze quickly. Yara decides to ask about the special ingredient that made the ice cream mix freeze.
column2: ice cream mix in the vat

column1: Sam was in the kitchen making a cake. Sam wanted to wash his hands before he started to bake. The sink in the kitchen was clean. Over time, the sink slowly filled with dirty water from the leaking tap. Sam decides to clean the sink before washing his hands.

Adam was in his lab working on his science project. Adam wanted to finish his project before the end of the day. The lab clock was synchronized with the school's main clock. The janitor, while cleaning, accidentally unplugged the lab clock, making it asynchronous with the school's main clock. Adam decides to ask the janitor to plug the clock back in.

Ollie was in the kitchen ready to make dinner. Ollie wanted to cut some veggies for a fine soup. The knife was sharp and ready to use. As the evening went on, the knife got dull from cutting so many veggies. Ollie decides to sharpen the knife before continuing his cooking.

Benny was at the park near the harmless creek. Benny wanted to sing a new song he just learned. The creek was quiet and restful. A group of ducks landed in the creek, disrupting its quiet flow. Benny decides to stop singing and watch the ducks.

Lenny was in a subway station waiting for his train. Lenny wanted to share his lunch with a friend who was also taking the subway. The tracks for the subway were aligned. A subway worker, while doing his routine checks, found a misalignment in the tracks and fixed it. Lenny decides to thank the worker for ensuring their safety.

Xander was in the park playing a game of knights with his friends. Xander wanted to be the best knight and protect his friends with his shield. The shield Xander was using was made of cardboard and was originally opaque. The sun shone brightly and over time, the shield became faded and transparent. Xander will try to find a new shield.

Noah was at a busy coffee shop waiting for his friend. Noah wanted to buy a coffee and sit with his friend. The coffee machine was working well. The barista accidentally flipped a switch, causing the coffee machine to stop working. Noah decides to stand and wait until the coffee machine is fixed.

Yesterday, Yara was playing with her favorite toy car in the kitchen. She wanted to make the car do a big jump over the sink. The drain in the sink was closed. As she was playing, her enthusiastic dog, Buddy, saw the toy car and tried to catch it, opening the drain in the process. Yara will quickly grab the toy car before it can vanish down the drain.

Vito was at a park, watching the birds. Vito wanted to sit on the park bench and enjoy his lunch. The bench was dry and clean. A generous man, who was passing by, spilled his large bottle of water, which made the bench wet. Vito decides to find another bench to sit on.

Dan was in the park for his morning jog. Dan wanted to finish his jog and pick some fresh radishes from the park's garden. The ice cream cone sitting on the park bench was solid. As the sun got hotter, the ice cream in the cone started to melt. Dan decides to throw the melted ice cream in the trash bin.
column2: ice cream cone on the park bench

column1: Finn was at the beach, ready for a swim. Finn wanted to swim in the sea where the popular shark named "Bubbles" was known to play. The shark cage was open. The beach guard, noticing a storm brewing, closed the shark cage as a safety measure. Finn decides to wait until the storm passes and the cage is reopened.

Hana was at the park playing with her kite. Hana wants to fly her kite high up in the sky. The cable on Hana's kite is tied tightly. A playful dog runs by, tugs at the kite string and loosens the cable. Hana decides to pull her kite down and re-tighten the cable.

Max was at the park ready to play. Max wanted to play a fun game of hide and seek. The rag he used as a marker was neatly folded on the bench. A gust of wind blew, causing the rag to unfold and become messy. Max decides to skip his turn to hide and go fold the rag again.

Uri was in the music room at school. Uri wanted to play a harmless prank on his friend. The piano in the music room was light. Over the weekend, the school staff had to replace the piano with a heavier one because the old one was broken. Uri decides to discuss his prank plan with his friend instead of going ahead with it.

Yara was at a park playing with her green ball. Yara wanted to play catch with her dad. The ball was very bouncy. A soldier walking by accidentally stepped on the ball, making it less bouncy. Yara decides to ask the soldier if he could help fix the ball or offer to buy a new one.

Tia was at the park playing with her toy cart. Tia wanted to push her cart down the hill and watch it roll. The cart's wheels were tight and good for rolling. A dog running by bumped into the cart, causing one wheel to loosen and stop rolling well. Tia feels anxious and decides to fix the wheel before playing again.

Val was in the kitchen getting ready for a party. Val wanted to make a cold drink for her friends. The metal tie she used to wrap the ice was cold and conductive. Over time, the metal tie warmed up due to the heat from the room. Val decided to put the metal tie in the fridge to cool it down.

Flora was in her classroom, waiting for her friends to play a game. Flora wanted to play a game of twist-the-bottle. The cap on the bottle was twisted tight. A classmate, trying to get a drink, couldn't open the bottle and asked the teacher for help who untwisted the cap. Flora decides to ask the teacher to twist the cap back on the bottle.

Gus was at the park drawing pictures with his crayons. Gus wanted to draw a big, beautiful rainbow. The box of crayons was full of many colors. A playful dog ran by and knocked over the box, causing the crayons to spill out. Gus decides to collect the spilled crayons and continue his drawing.

Gabe was at the park playing with his toy magnet. Gabe wanted to show his friends how his toy magnet could pick up small metal pieces. The toy magnet was very strong. A rude dog came by and chewed on Gabe's toy magnet, making it less dense and less strong. Gabe decides to pause his demonstration and take his toy magnet away from the dog.
